content: is knit in the round from the bottom up crochet cast on provides stable and sufficiently stretchy beginning for 2 by 2 ribbing other stretchy cast on may be used if you have a preferred one the body of the hat continues with simple colorwork pattern that will be perfect for a beginner knitter the floats on the back of the work are no bigger than 3 stitches wide and therefore are easy to manage the crown is shaped with six lines of double decreases the sample uses dark grey as main color and black as contrasting color but other color combinations may be applied depending on your own taste and style pattern provides a chart as well as written instructions for colorwork complete ptiloris hat video tutorial 1 crochet cast on and joining in the round tutorial 2 fleece lining for a hat tutorial 3 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=-qxnnlhgqpa 2 https //www youtube com/watch v=bbuajolhbki 3 https //www youtube com/watch v=byc3pgld4t4
